price: 221. Ar Man pranešti jums (žmonės) (apie tai) ant ko nusileidžia Šajatin (velniai)?
arabic: هَلۡ أُنَبِّئُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينُ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: hal unabbi-ukum ʿalā man tanazzalu al-shayāṭīnu
